meanings: 토픽 I'm still hanging in there.

vlive.korean: 이렇게 한 10분 버틸 거야? Are we going to do this for 10 minutes? 듣기 View video BTS : 아미와 함께 해피뉴이어!
vlive.english: Are we going to do this for 10 minutes?

vlive.korean: 경민 님이 "군 생활을 버틸 수 있었던 원동력은?" This is a question from "Kyungmin". "What kept you alive in the military?" 듣기 View video INFINITE : 보고싶었성규♥
vlive.english: This is a question from "Kyungmin". "What kept you alive in the military?"

vlive.korean: 못 버틸 같은데 버텨준 멤버가 누가 있어? someone could have quitted. You thought he would quit but did not. Who do you think he was? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]SEVENTEEN X LieV - 세븐틴의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: someone could have quitted. You thought he would quit but did not. Who do you think he was?

vlive.korean: [뽀둥뽀둥 쌀알전 특집 열고] 이렇게 한 10분 버틸 거야? [They'll give up the space of Mona Lisa] Are we going to stay like that for 10 minutes? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [BTS] 2020 덕담 트렌드는 인과응보 스타일, 복 받으려면 잘하자~!💜ヽ(･∀･)ﾉ💜 (BTS’s New Year Countdown)
vlive.english: [They'll give up the space of Mona Lisa] Are we going to stay like that for 10 minutes?

vlive.korean: 버틸 수 있겠지? It will be okay, right? 듣기 View video VIXX : 혁재구 막공🙏

examples.korean: She won’t last long in that job. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 그 직장에서 오래 못 버틸 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She won’t last long in that job. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She can hold her own against anybody in an argument. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 언쟁에서 누구와 맞서도 꿋꿋이 버틸 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She can hold her own against anybody in an argument. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She managed to eke out her student loan till the end of the year. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 학자금 융자금을 조금씩 아껴 써서 간신히 그 해 말까지 버틸 수 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She managed to eke out her student loan till the end of the year. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The king's rule was so oppressive that no one could stand it anymore. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 왕의 통치가 너무나 억압적이어서 아무도 더 이상은 버틸 수가 없었다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: The king's rule was so oppressive that no one could stand it anymore. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Mach-S, the speed at which stress can't keep up, is simply forward motion. But it has to be self- propelled. Note that people in cars are still stressed. (Jef Mallett) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 스트레스가 버틸 수 없는 속도인 마하 S는 단순한 전진 운동이야. 그러나 마하 S는 자체 추진되어야 하지. 차에 탄 사람들이 여전히 스트레스를 받고 있음을 생각해봐. (역주: 차에 탄 사람들이 전진 운동을 하긴 하지만 자체 추진한 전진운동이 아니기 때문에 스트레스를 여전히 받고 있다는 뜻) (제프 말렛, 노력명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Mach-S, the speed at which stress can't keep up, is simply forward motion. But it has to be self- propelled. Note that people in cars are still stressed. (Jef Mallett) Add to Wordbook
